title: The crypto conundrum: Should you invest your super in Bitcoin?
description: You probably wouldn’t pick cryptocurrency as a safe or viable superannuation investment option, but it’s extremely profitable and growing in popularity.

title: Hyperscale Data Launches $100M Bitcoin Treasury for AI, Crypto Pivot
description: Hyperscale Data Inc. announced a $100 million Bitcoin treasury strategy to transform into a pure-play AI and digital asset firm, funded by asset sales and equity offerings. The plan includes weekly disclosures and yield tactics, amid AI data center expansion. This move boosted its stock, signaling growing corporate crypto adoption.
